about_the_game:
Slot Waste is a 3D first-person simulation of a mysterious factory production line. In this episode-length art game, navigate linearly through a series of 10 mini-games and discover what actions will move the production process forward. Complete each sequence and be rewarded with detailed real-time animations that connect each stage.

Alongside grotesque creatures and strange machines, take on your role as the spirit of the factory and bring the production process to completion…but will it really ever end…?


Features

  • 10 artfully modeled and unique mini-games
  • Atmospheric and dream-like environment
  • Play through every game with just your left joystick or WASD keys!
  • Hand-made animations that will keep you guessing as to what is happening next

content_descriptors.notes: moments of cartoonish violence and cruelty

name: Slot Waste

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: An episode-length first-person factory simulation. Navigate through a series of 10 unique and weird mini-games. What are you producing and who are you making it for?
